title: bhavarOga vaidyanE
sahitya:
bhavarOga vaidyanE Om sharaN parama karuNAkaranE


anupallavi

  navayuga bhArata shivamaya shaktiyAl jnAlattilE jnAna lIlai sheibavanE


caraNam    endenda madangaLum vandu paNindiDum Eka samarasattai yOgamuDan aLittAi
bandhamillAda aruT-candak-kavitai pADip-paraviDum pErinba varam enakkaruLvAi
